page.title: 11SALTERS LANE FARMS
page.content: There are 3 farms near this lane which is off the A.34. 1. ASTON HILL FARM (65 acres) Owned by Staffs C.C. and farmed by Mrs D.Clay. The farm deals mainly in dairy cattle and pigs. The land has heavy soil on clay and grows grass. 3 workers are employed. Slightly hilly land. 2. WOOD FARM (50 acres) Owned by Staffs C.C. and farmed by Mr P.Meese. This farm has beef cattle and sheep. The land is flat with heavy top- soil on clay. 2 workers and grass as chief crop. 3. BIRCH FARM (35 acres) Owned by Staffs C.C. and farmed by Mr T.E.Ball. Chief crop grass with dairy and beef cattle with sheep. 2 workers help on this dairy farm situated on mainly level land with heavy soils on clay.
